content:
path /v3/ethereum/account/balance/address
operationId EthGetBalance
parameters
description Account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
description Type of Ethereum testnet Defaults to ethereumsepolia
in header
name xtestnettype
required False
schema
default ethereumsepolia
type string
summary Get the ETH balance of an Ethereum account
description 1 credit per API call
Get the balance of ETH of an Ethereum account
To get the balance of tokens use the APIs for getting the balance of fungible tokens ERC20 and NFTs ERC721
responses
200
EthBalance
type object
balance
type string
description Balance in ETH
description OK
